name: perl-rose-db

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: A DBI wrapper and abstraction layer.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-bit-vector
dependencies.description: Efficient bit vector, set of integers and "big int" math library

dependencies.name: perl-datetime
dependencies.description: DateTime - A date and time object for Perl

dependencies.name: perl-datetime-format-mysql
dependencies.description: Parse and format MySQL dates and times

dependencies.name: perl-datetime-format-oracle
dependencies.description: Parse and format Oracle dates and timestamps

dependencies.name: perl-datetime-format-pg
dependencies.description: Parse and format PostgreSQL dates and times

dependencies.name: perl-dbi
dependencies.description:
The DBI is the standard database interface module for Perl. It defines a
set of methods, variables and conventions that provide a consistent
database interface independent of the actual database being used.

dependencies.name: perl-time-clock
dependencies.description: Twenty-four hour clock object with nanosecond precision.
